Container.Name: Umbrel Bitcoin
Container.Overview: Umbrel Bitcoin is a Bitcoin Core node packaged for easy deployment. It provides a full Bitcoin node with RPC access, block validation capabilities, and optional Tor/I2P privacy integration.
Container.Description:
Umbrel Bitcoin is a Bitcoin Core node that allows you to run your own Bitcoin node. This provides you with:
- Full Bitcoin blockchain validation - RPC access for Bitcoin applications - Enhanced privacy and security with optional Tor/I2P - Support for the Bitcoin network - Integration with Umbrel Electrs for wallet connectivity
The app runs Bitcoin Core in a Docker container with optimized settings for home servers. Install this first before installing the Umbrel Electrs app.

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_NETWORK
Variable.Description: Bitcoin network to connect to (mainnet, testnet, or regtest)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_RPC_USER
Variable.Description: RPC username for Bitcoin Core (used by Electrs app)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_RPC_PASSWORD
Variable.Description: RPC password for Bitcoin Core (must match Electrs app - CHANGE THIS!)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_RPC_BIND
Variable.Description: RPC bind address (0.0.0.0 allows Electrs container to connect)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_RPC_ALLOW_IP
Variable.Description: Allowed IPs for RPC access (0.0.0.0/0 allows container network access)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_DISABLE_WALLET
Variable.Description: Disable wallet functionality (1=disabled, 0=enabled)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_TXINDEX
Variable.Description: Enable transaction index (1=enabled, 0=disabled) - REQUIRED for Electrs

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_BLOCKFILTERINDEX
Variable.Description: Enable block filter index (1=enabled, 0=disabled) - REQUIRED for Electrs

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_PRUNING
Variable.Description: Enable pruning (0=disabled, or size in MB)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_DBCACHE
Variable.Description: Database cache size in MB (higher = faster sync, more RAM usage)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_MAXMEMPOOL
Variable.Description: Maximum mempool size in MB

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_MAXCONNECTIONS
Variable.Description: Maximum number of connections to other nodes

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_MAXUPLOADTARGET
Variable.Description: Maximum upload target in MB per day

Variable.Name: ENABLE_TOR
Variable.Description: Enable Tor privacy network integration (1=enabled, 0=disabled)

Variable.Name: ENABLE_I2P
Variable.Description: Enable I2P privacy network integration (1=enabled, 0=disabled)

Variable.Name: TOR_SOCKS_PORT
Variable.Description: Tor SOCKS proxy port

Variable.Name: TOR_CONTROL_PORT
Variable.Description: Tor control port

Variable.Name: TOR_CONTROL_PASSWORD
Variable.Description: Tor control password (CHANGE THIS!)

Variable.Name: I2P_SAM_PORT
Variable.Description: I2P SAM protocol port

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_COINSTATSINDEX
Variable.Description: Enable coin stats index (1=enabled, 0=disabled)

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_MEMPOOLEXPIRY
Variable.Description: Mempool expiry in hours

Variable.Name: BITCOIN_PAR
Variable.Description: Number of parallel script check threads (0=auto)
